column5: Hi all,  walk out 20 yards onto our bay with a spud bar. 4" black ice, only 2 cms of snow with not much in the forecast. Got to help a buddy get a 14 point buck saturday morning but will try and get on the ice somewhere this weekend for an evening bite.
Good for you.  Venison in the morning, walleye fillets in the evening.  It doesn't get any better!  Right now Niagara is -9 with 30km winds.  By Monday they're forecasting +10.
